name: automaton
description: Retrieve information regarding the automaton's creation.

name: byname
description: Change the byname (nickname) of the automaton. (Admin only)

name: eventhandler
description: Configure the automaton's usage and directives. (Admin Only)

name: help
description: Receive a list of OR assistance with the automaton's directives -- organized by category.

name: patron
description: Enable patron (premium) features for your guild. (Admin Only)

name: ping
description: Inquire of the latency of the automaton.

name: updates
description: Retrieve the latest important update information regarding the automaton.

name: autopurge
description: Allow the automaton to automatically purge messages from a desired channel. (Admin Only)

name: moderate
description: Configure the moderation settings for the guild. (Admin Only)

name: promotion
description: Configure the promotion settings for your guild. (Admin Only)

name: starboard
description: Configure the settings for the starboard messages. (Admin Only)

name: streaming
description: Configure the settings for streaming statuses and notifications. (Admin Only)

name: timedembeds
description: Configure the settings for the timed embed messages. (Admin Only)

name: welcome
description: Configure the settings for the welcome messages. (Admin Only)

name: birthdaylist
description: Allow the automaton to provide you a list of all dates of birth for your guild. (Admin Only)

name: getbirthday
description: Allow the automaton to provide you with a user's date of birth.

name: removebirthday
description: Allow the automaton to remove a date of birth from the register.

name: setbirthday
description: Manually input thy date of birth for the automaton to commit to memory.

name: defineimproper
description: The automaton will define a term for you in its improper (slang/urban) form.

name: defineproper
description: The automaton will define a term for you in its proper form.

name: embedder
description: Send embedded messages to a channel. (Admin Only)

name: embedslist
description: List all the timed embeds created so far. (Admin Only)

name: giftgiving
description: Permit the automaton to arrange a prize drawing for an item of your preference. (Admin Only)

name: iconography
description: Receive a list of the guild's iconography.

name: play
description: The automaton will help you reach out to other like-minded players in search of game companions.

name: promote
description: Promote your guild (server).

name: purge
description: Purge messages from a desired channel. (Manage Messages Privileges)

name: search
description: The automaton will demonstrate how to find something on the internet.

name: testpromote
description: Test the promotion for your guild. (Admin Only)

name: testwelcome
description: Test how the automaton welcomes newcomers. (Admin Only)

name: weather
description: Allow the automaton to retrieve the weather data for your location of choice.
